pullrequest.title: Add BUILD_TESTING CMake option and tests target

content.raw:
Exactly, this is due to a bug in CMake, see https://gitlab.kitware.com/cmake/cmake/issues/8774 . 

More in general, my typical approach in this situation is that the `test` target is simply disabled when `BUILD_TESTING` is set to OFF, however for this PR I just copied the logic available in Gazebo for consistency, but I would be happy to introduce the logic that you prefer.
